oai_dc:dc.dc:title: D8.4 Multimedia presentation on Data collection experiences: case study results
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Surveys and statistics
Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Within the OrganicDataNetwork project, six case studies - for Germany, France, Italy, Czech Republic, UK, and the Mediterranean region – were carried out. The goal was to test and improve data collection procedures and to come to publish improved market reports in these countries/regions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: OrganicDataNetwork (2014) D8.4 Multimedia presentation on Data collection experiences: case study results. Università Politecnica delle Marche, Ancona, Italy.
